h2_title: Water-Wood Beast Boss Fight and Guide
img_above_text:
# Water-Wood Beast
Water-Wood Beast is one of the optional Yaoguai Chiefs you can fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong. This hidden beast lurks beneath the water and will try to catch you by surprise as much as it can.
## Water-Wood Beast Boss Fight and Guide

You can then detransform and follow up with your own strong attacks and it will continue to burn for a while until it douses itself off with the water.
img_below_text: As its health starts to get low, it will dive into the water and behave similarly to Jiao-Loong of Waves, where it will try to dive up and catch you by surprise. You'll see it emerge and peek up before it disappears again and the ground begins to rumble. You'll be able to see ripples in the water, that show you the exact path the beast is taking to reach you.
